data.name: AddTrainingDay_DateTE
data.value: Entry date. If the entry contains session training, then this is the training date.

data.name: ButtonApply
data.value: Saves changes without closing the window.

data.name: ButtonCancel
data.value: Rejects changes and close the window.

data.name: ButtonDelete
data.value: Delete the current entry.

data.name: ButtonOK
data.value: Saves changes and close the window.

data.name: CreateProfile_Autologin_CHK
data.value: When selected means that when we start the application, this profile will be logged automatically.

data.name: CreateProfile_NameTE
data.value: Profile name will be used during login to the application. Must be unique.

data.name: CreateProfile_PasswordTE
data.value: Password is used to prevent access to your profile. It is not required. When there is only one profile without password in the application, then it will be used automatically when application starts (without login).

data.name: Login_AutologinCHK
data.value: When selected means that when we start the application, this profile will be logged automatically.

data.name: Login_NameTE
data.value: Profile name from the program's database.

data.name: Login_PasswordTE
data.value: Password for the selected profile.

data.name: ProfileEdit_BirthdayTE
data.value: Birthday. Can be empty.

data.name: ProfileEdit_NameTE
data.value: Name of edited profile. Must be unique.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_Klatka
data.value: Chest circumference, e.g. 110,5. Value 0 means that chest circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_LeftBiceps
data.value: Left biceps circumference, e.g. 37,5. Value 0 means that biceps circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_NaCzczo
data.value: Selected means that all measurements was made on empty stomach.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_Pas
data.value: Abs circumference, e.g. 77,5. Value 0 means that abs circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_RightBiceps
data.value: Right biceps circumference, e.g. 37,5. Value 0 means that biceps circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_Time
data.value: Time of measurement, e.g: 7:05. Value 00:00 means that time was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_RightLeg
data.value: Right leg circumference, e.g. 67,5. Value 0 means that leg circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_Weight
data.value: Weight in kilograms, e.g. 81,5. Value 0 means that weight was not set.

data.name: BMI_BMI
data.value:
This is your body mass index (BMI):
Severely underweight - less than 16.5 Underweight - from 16.5 to 18.4 Normal - from 18.5 to 24.9 Overweight - from 25 to 29.9 Obese Class I - from 30 to 34.9 Obese Class II - from 35 to 39.9 Obese Class III - over 40

data.name: BMI_Calculate
data.value: Click to calculate your BMI. You have to type your weight and height first.

data.name: BMI_Close
data.value: Closes this window

data.name: BMI_Height
data.value: Type your height in cm

data.name: BMI_Weight
data.value: Type your weight in kg

data.name: OptionCalendarIcons
data.value: Here you can set options related with each module in BodyArchitect: Icon - if selected then entry for this plugin will be shown in calendar view as icon Default - if selected then entry for this plugin will be automatically added when you create a new entry day in the calendar view

data.name: OptionCalendarTabPage
data.value: Shows options for calendar view

data.name: OptionCalendarTextFrom
data.value: Indicates from what plugin calendar view will show info text

data.name: ProfileEdit_GenderCMB
data.value: Allows you to specify your gender. This information is needed to use some of calculators (for instance BMI)

data.name: WymiaryEditor_Height
data.value: Height in cm, e.g. 188. Value 0 means that height was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_LeftForearm
data.value: Left forearm circumference, e.g. 27,5. Value 0 means that forearm circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_LeftLeg
data.value: Left leg circumference, e.g. 67,5. Value 0 means that leg circumference was not set.

data.name: WymiaryEditor_RightForearm
data.value: Right forearm circumference, e.g. 27,5. Value 0 means that forearm circumference was not set.

data.name: OptionReportingAllowZoom
data.value: If selected, you can zoom reports.

data.name: OptionReportingShowValues
data.value: If selected, on reports you will see values as labels, otherwise reports will only display lines.

data.name: OptionReportingTemplates
data.value: List of all templates (themes) for reporting view.

data.name: usrReportStatus_ReportStatusCmb
data.value: Indicates if current entry will be used in reports. Value Show means that you will see this entry in reports, value Skip means, that reports will not use it.

data.name: usrReportingEntryStatus_ReportStatusCmb
data.value: Indicates what entries will be used to generate the report. Select -For report only when you want to generate report with entries with ReportStatus Show this entry in reports only. -All entries to generate report with all entries (also with ReportStatus Skip this entry in reports

data.name: usrDateRange_DateFrom
data.value: Here you are able to define starting date for you report. All entries which are older will not be shown.

data.name: usrDateRange_DateTo
data.value: Here you are able to define end date for you report. All newer entries will not be shown.

data.name: OptionResetAllBtn
data.value: Resets all settings to default values.

data.name: usrMyTrainingStatus_Abort
data.value: Click here to abort (stop) this training cycle. You will not be able to resume this cycle again.

data.name: usrMyTrainingStatus_EndDate
data.value: Date when this training cycle has been finished.

data.name: usrMyTrainingStatus_StartDate
data.value: Date when this training cycle has been started.

data.name: DefaultDataImporter_ImportBTN
data.value: Starts importing default data to the current profile. TO choose what data you want to import, please selected one or more items in the list.

data.name: DefaultDataImporter_ModulesListView
data.value: List of all available data to import. To import data you need to select appropriate item in this list and press Import... button.

data.name: OptionCalendarShowRelativeDates
data.value: If checked, the dates in the application (for example comment date or last login date) will be displayed as relative date from current moment, like: 2 minutes ago, 5 months ago, etc. If unchecked then you see specific date.
